argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumsup.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumsup.2 | |- G = seq M ( + , F ) |
| 3 |  | isumsup.3 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | isumsup.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 5 |  | isumsup.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | isumsup.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 7 |  | isumsup.7 | |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. j e. Z ( G ` j ) <_ x ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_isumsup2 | |- ( ph -> G ~~> sup ( ran G , RR , < ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_syl5eqbrr | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> sup ( ran G , RR , < ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 3, 4, 8, 10 | #P_isumclim | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A = sup ( ran G , RR , < ) ) |
